    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddItemController
    Controller for the "Add Item" modal dialog.
    AddItemController.IngredientItem
    Represents a pairing of an inventory ingredient name and a required quantity for a menu item.
    BobaPosController
    Main controller for the BobaPos application Handles role-based access control for different tabs
    CheckoutController
    Controller for the checkout screen of the Boba POS application.
    CheckoutController.Item
    Lightweight data model representing a menu item available for order.
    DatabaseConfig
    Database configuration utility class that manages database connections for the Boba POS system.
    EmployeesController
    Controller for the Employee Management tab using JDBC.
    EmployeesController.Employee
    Data model for an Employee.
    InventoryController
    Controller class for managing inventory in the Boba POS system.
    InventoryController.InventoryItem
    Data model for an Inventory Item.
    LoginController
    Controller for the Login page of the Boba POS system.
    Main
    The main entry point for the Boba POS application.
    ModificationsController
    Controller for handling item modifications in the Boba POS system.
    OrderController
    Controller class for managing orders in the POS system.
    OrderController.Sale
    Lightweight model representing a sale record shown in the orders table.
    TestCheckout
    Small utility class to exercise the checkout HTTP endpoint during development.
    TrendsController
    Controller for Trends tab with Product Usage Chart and X-Report support.
    UserSession
    Manages user session information for the Boba POS system using the Singleton pattern.
    ZReportController
    Controller for the Z-Report tab Handles employee sales analysis and summary statistics
